input.sentences: we 're at the diner | and everyone is excited for the fourth of july . she even had on a special shirt for the occasion !
i was taking pictures of everyone | and she did n't want her picture taken .
but this guy definitely did . he was wearing the best hat for the 4th of july .
and this woman was wearing a great patriotic shirt .
we ended our night with some awesome fireworks outside of the diner .
output.sentences: Aunt Julie Ann wore her special fourth of July shirt for the special occassion.
Their family was taking pictures that evening so they called Grandma to come join.
Cousin Tom arrived wearing his special fourth of July hat.
The woman he came with was wearing a fourth of July shirt.
That night everyone watched the fireworks standing outside the diner.
